article.title: Progeny Systems to Provide Data Acquisition and Retrieval System
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Progeny Systems Corporation, Manassas, Virginia, is being awarded a $14,801,175 indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity, cost-plus-fixed-fee, Small Business Innovative Research (SBIR) phase three contract to mature, adapt, and utilize the Data Acquisition and Retrieval System developed by Progeny Systems under Naval Sea Systems Command SBIR topic N99-100, used to collect combat systems data used on Navy submarines. The Naval Undersea Warfare Center, Newport, Rhode Island, is the contracting activity.
